item.title: Server setup (Ubuntu/Windows) Graphics Interface super simple setup
item.description:
We’re seeking a skilled freelancer to assist with setting up a server running either Ubuntu or Windows, incorporating a graphics interface.

super simple setup , it should just run browser software at all times, and I need to be able to easily connect via RDP \ AnyDesk \ anything else
